articles.title: Fallout 76 fans say the new NPCs are looting their dead bodies - Polygon
articles.description: Fallout 76 fans are reporting an odd bug with the introduction of Wastelanders. During open world events, NPCs are taking weapons off the bodies of players — and they’re not returning them.
articles.content:
Fallout 76s new Wastelanders expansion is a solid update that brings a traditional Fallout-style RPG structure, NPCs and all, to the once-barren hills of Appalachia. But some of the bugs players are discovering are as unfortunate as they are hilarious. 
Spot… [+1639 chars]
